sentences.english: A key part of the program hasbeen to commercialize outstanding health science technologies from themedical colleges.
sentences.chinese: 專業的核心是將醫學院校的生命科學技術商品化。

sentences.english: The rapid development of the present vocational colleges calls for the 2nd-level management in schools or departments.
sentences.chinese: 院系二級管理是當前高職院校迅速發展的需要。

sentences.english: The construction of fine courses is a main component of the construction of an examplar higher vocational college.
sentences.chinese: 精品課程建設是示範院校專業建設的主要內涵。

sentences.english: Pairs of Private Vocational Colleges dissatisfied with lack of self-affirmation, strong inferiority complex.
sentences.chinese: 對民辦高職院校感到不滿，自我肯定不足，自卑感強。

sentences.english: Police academy is a part of the ordinary colleges.
sentences.chinese: 公安院校是全國普通高等學校的組成部分。

sentences.english: The schoolwork weighs heavily on the students of traditional Chinese medicine colleges and universities;
sentences.chinese: 中醫院校大學生的課業負擔較重，生活相對單一。

sentences.english: Combined with the well-known institutions, the Department of labor and personnel departments cooperation in running schools.
sentences.chinese: 聯合各知名院校，各勞動部門和人事部門合作辦學。

sentences.english: of seats in elite colleges and universities?
sentences.chinese: 那麼對於進入精英院校的坐席的分配問題呢？

sentences.english: The UGC advises the Government on the development of these institutions and on their financial needs.
sentences.chinese: 教資會就各院校的發展和撥款需要，向政府提供意見。

sentences.english: The figure represents the number of votes received by each school.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的數據是各所院校所獲得的推薦次數。

sentences.english: Fostering innovatory capability is the reform target for professional education.
sentences.chinese: 培養學生的能力是高職院校教育改革和發展的目標。

sentences.english: Forth, lay emphasis on the construction of invisible courses and enhance the cultural taste of medical college.
sentences.chinese: 第四，注重隱性課程建設，提升醫學院校的文化品位。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effectiveness of health education on AIDS prevention among normal university students.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價師範院校大學生預防艾滋病健康教育的效果。

sentences.english: It seems all up-dated technologies comes out from institutes and colleges.
sentences.chinese: 似乎所有的現代技術都來自高等院校。

sentences.english: This study provides some implications for English teaching and learning in vocational colleges in our country.
sentences.chinese: 本研究爲中國高職院校英語教與學提供了一些啓示。

sentences.english: The subjects of this study were 83 students of English majors from a key Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 研究對象爲一重點師範院校的83名英語專業學生。
